dc_creator_sm: New York (N.Y.). Department of City Planning
dc_description_s: A Lower Density Growth Management Area is an area designated in the Zoning Resolution where new developments must provide more off-street parking, larger yards and more open space than would otherwise be required in the applicable zoning districts In Staten Island and Bronx Community District 10.
dc_publisher_s: New York (N.Y.). Department of City Planning
dc_title_s: New York, NY (Low Density Growth Management Areas, 2011)
